description:
Van Cleef & Arpels Santal Blanc Eau De Parfum - A Masterpiece of Elegance

Experience the captivating allure of Van Cleef & Arpels Santal Blanc, a luxurious fragrance that embodies sophistication and timeless elegance. This exquisite 75ml eau de parfum delivers a mesmerizing blend of sandalwood and creamy notes that envelop you in a warm, comforting embrace. âœ¨

Key Features of Santal Blanc Eau De Parfum

  • ðŸŒ¿ Premium sandalwood essence for a rich, woody foundation
  • ðŸ’Ž Exceptional longevity that lasts throughout the day
  • ðŸ”¥ Sophisticated unisex appeal suitable for any occasion
  • ðŸŒ¸ Creamy milk accord that softens the woody intensity
  • ðŸ’« Elegant bottle design reflecting Van Cleef & Arpels' jewelry heritage

Part of the prestigious Collection Extraordinaire, Santal Blanc represents the pinnacle of Van Cleef & Arpels' perfumery artistry. Created in 2019, this fragrance continues the legacy of a brand that has been synonymous with luxury since 1906. The House of Van Cleef & Arpels initially gained fame for its exquisite jewelry before expanding into the world of fine fragrances, bringing the same meticulous attention to detail to their perfume creations.

Santal Blanc masterfully balances the woody depth of sandalwood with creamy, milky notes, creating a contemporary fragrance that's both comforting and sophisticated. The addition of fig brings a subtle fruity sweetness that perfectly complements the sandalwood heart. âœ¨

Frequently Asked Question

How long does Van Cleef & Arpels Santal Blanc last on skin?

Santal Blanc Eau De Parfum offers impressive longevity, typically lasting 8-10 hours on skin. The high-quality woody notes and premium concentration ensure that the fragrance develops beautifully throughout the day, with the creamy sandalwood heart remaining prominent for hours. For maximum longevity, apply to pulse points and moisturized skin. ðŸ”¥
short_description: Discover Van Cleef & Arpels Santal Blanc, a luxurious unisex fragrance where creamy sandalwood meets delicate fig. This sophisticated 75ml Eau de Parfum creates an aura of refined elegance with its perfect balance of woody warmth and milky smoothness.
